original_title: Mighty Mouse in the Great Space Chase
overview: Shorts from "The New Adventures of Mighty Mouse and Heckle and Jeckle" Saturday morning cartoon show edited together into a movie. Space cat villain Harry the Heartless holds space mouse Queen Pureheart. Only Mighty Mouse can save her.
tagline: The Cartoon Superhero in His First Feature Film
title: Mighty Mouse in the Great Space Chase
